abbot.editor
Class EditorContext

java.lang.Object
  abbot.editor.EditorContext

public class EditorContext
extends java.lang.Object

Provide a transport for the editor context. This is usefull in cases where the costello editor is invoked inside of another application. It can also be used to provide further editor customization, for example a new file template, depending on the context.
